author: author
sureToCancelTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete the expense? It can be restored in the list of expenses.
allSettledUp: You are all settled up in this group
featureSoon: This feature will be available soon
analyzeCategories: Analyze each category and manage your finances
chatTypeDescription: For personal budget you have monthly limits, for sharing bills you have cashback options
makeBillyAdminTitle: Make Billy an admin in the chat so it can function correctly:
makeBillyAdminFeature1: Delete messages with spending details to avoid spamming the chat
makeBillyAdminFeature2: Pin the spending menu for quick access
makeBillyAdminFeature3: Add participants to mini app as they join the chat
onlyAdmin: Only a chat admin can do this
featureCategories: Defining and analyzing expenses by category
featureCashback: Cashback for paying for shared expenses
voiceLimitMessage:
You have reached your limit for recording voice and text expenses in this chat (4 free entries per user). Purchase Billy Pro to continue.

You can still add expenses via the 'Add Expense' button in the app.
slide1_text: Just add me to your chat to start using the bot. Expenses can be recorded both by text and voice messages! I will find these messages in the chat and take everything into account.
slide2_title: Tired of transferring money to each other after each bill?
slide2_text: It's easy to write about the expense in the chat - Billy will see it and write it down in history. At the end of the period, he will sum up all the expenses and tell who owes whom how much.
slide3_title: No one wants to take responsibility for paying the group bills?
slide3_text: Pay for friends - get group cashback in Billy with real money!
slide4_title: Won't get up from the table until we count who ate how much?
slide4_text: Write down the expense now, and your friends will fill in their shares later.
slide5_title: The most convenient way to manage a group budget!
slide5_text1: Simplify settle up by recalculating all expenses into the selected currency. This is especially true when traveling!
slide5_subtitle2: The bot cleans its chat messages
slide5_text2: Billy cleans up all service messages in the chat, leaving all important information in the application interface
slide6_title: Benefits with a Billy Pro subscription
slide6_subtitle1: Unlimited input of expenses by voice or text
slide6_text1: While free version, there are only 4 voice or text recordings available in shared chats. Besides, you can always enter expenses inside the bot without restrictions.
slide6_text2: Billy will automatically select a category for each bill, and will provide an analysis
slide6_text3: Get cashback while paying for others
errorForbidden: Oh, I wasn't allowed to show you these numbers. Most likely because you are not in the chat.
errorOther: Something didn't work, but I'm already fixing it. Try refreshing the page.
